name: choccl

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch), wcel(c0, csh))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch))

comment: Closure of complement of Hilbert subspace. Part of Remark 3.12 of [Beran] p. 107. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)
